parameters.text:
=You are an expert B2B marketing copy-writer AI agent who will create a fully formatted success story HTML file based on the following template.
Use exactly the field labels and structure described below. Do not change or remove any field names. Only the content (i.e., what is inside each field or paragraph) will change based on the input you receive.

FIELDS (exact labels):
Industry : {{ $json.body.Industry }}
Company : {{ $json.body['Company Name'] }}
Location : {{ $json.body.Location }}
Product Focus : {{ $json.body['Product Focus'] }}
Target Market : {{ $json.body['Target Market'] }}
Key Challenge : {{ $json.body['Key Challenge'] }}
Campaign Duration : {{ $json.body['Campaign Duration'] }}
Initial Investment: {{ $json.body['Initial Investment'] }}
Key Results : {{ $json.body['Key Results'] }}
ROI : {{ $json.body.ROI }}
Client Quote : {{ $json.body['Client Quote'] }}
Client Name : {{ $json.body.ClientName }}
Client Title : {{ $json.body['client Title'] }}



TEMPLATE STRUCTURE (to render in HTML):
#Follow this html structure:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
</head>
<body>
</body>
</html>


HEADER SECTION : 

Title (H1): “Success Story: Transforming Brand Visibility for a Leading Packaging Company” (replace with appropriate title based on input)

Meta info block (vertical list, one item per line, input labels bold): display each of the FIELDS above in order.


Client Overview

Paragraph describing the client (using Company, Industry, Location, Product Service Focus)

Paragraph describing the problem and why change was needed (mention Framework as partner).

The Challenge

Paragraph introducing the challenge

Bullet list of three key challenges (each beginning with field text)

Paragraph summarizing the need.

Pathvancer’s Approach (or if your input replaces “Pathvancer”, use Company of agency)

Paragraph introducing the approach and audit

Heading (H3) for “1. Strategic Positioning” + description

Heading (H3) for “2. Content & Engagement Engine” + description (bullet list inside)

Heading (H3) for “3. Automated Outreach System” + description.

Execution Timeline

Table with columns: Phase | Duration | Key Activities

Rows as per typical phases (Discovery & Audit; Positioning Setup; Campaign Launch; Optimization).

Results: Visibility Turned Into Growth

Bullet list of specific results (e.g., 3× increase in engagement; 27 qualified leads; improved brand recognition; reduced manual effort)

Paragraph summarizing the impact.

Client Feedback

Quote box with a quote from Head of Business Development (or similar role) of the company.

Conclusion

Paragraph with summary of success story, and paragraph about agency’s mission (or partner’s mission).

About [Agency]

Paragraph about the agency (use Framework or agency name) and mission.

DIAGRAM / STYLING SPECIFICATIONS:
Return only valid HTML code (no markdown, no explanation).
Start with <!DOCTYPE html> and end with </html>.
Include all CSS inline within <style> tags in the <head>.
Use the following color scheme, fonts, sizes, etc:

Primary Blue: #1e40af (dark blue)

Secondary Blue: #3b82f6 (light blue)

Accent Blue: #2563eb (medium blue)

Light Blue Background: #dbeafe

Accent Yellow: #fbbf24

Background: #ffffff

Alt Background: #f8fafc

Text: #1e293b

Secondary Text: #475569

Font: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Arial, sans-serif

H1: 32px bold, color #1e40af

H2: 26px bold, color #1e40af, bottom border #3b82f6

H3: 20px bold, color #2563eb

Body text: 15px, line-height 1.7, color #475569

Container max-width: 900px, centered

Section spacing: 40px between each section

When you receive the JSON input with all field values and relevant story content (client overview paragraph, challenge bullet points, approach paragraphs, results bullet list, client quote), generate the full HTML file using the above template and styling. Return ONLY valid HTML code no markdown, Do not change the field labels, structure, or styling. Replace placeholders with actual content from input. you should follow the strict structure given below (no markdowns):
TEMPLATE STRUCTURE (to render in HTML):
#Follow this html structure:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
</head>
<body>
</body>
</html>

parameters.content:
{
  "Industry": "Asthetic and Wellness",
  "Company Name": "Longativity Aging Solution",
  "Location": "South Africa",
  "Product Focus": "Anti Aging Bottox",
  "Target Market": "Women Enterprenuer",
  "Key Challenge": "Limited brand awareness, inefficient manual outreach, lack of strategic digital presence",
  "Framework Used": "LinkedIn-Centric Brand Visibility System",
  "Campaign Duration": "29 Days",
  "Initial Investment": "$300",
  "Key Results": "27 qualified leads, 3x engagement increase, 80% reduced manual effort",
  "ROI": "12.5X",
  "Client Quote": "Pathvancer completely changed how we look at LinkedIn. The engagement, conversations, and qualified leads we've seen in less than two weeks are incredible. It feels like our brand finally has a voice in the market.",
  "ClientName": "Head of Business Development",
  "client Title": "PackRight Solutions"
}

body.Key Challenge: Limited brand awareness, inefficient manual outreach, lack of strategic digital presence
body.Key Results: 27 qualified leads, 3x engagement increase, 80% reduced manual effort
body.Client Quote: Pathvancer completely changed how we look at LinkedIn. The engagement, conversations, and qualified leads we've seen in less than two weeks are incredible. It feels like our brand finally has a voice in the market.
